Table of Color Space Conversions

Source: R/conversions.R
cc_table.Rd

A data frame containing all the possible color space conversions that can be done with changeColorSpace.

data(cc_table)

Format

An object of class "data.frame".

See also

Image, changeColorSpace

Examples

data(cc_table)
cc_table

#>         From        To
#> 1        BGR      BGRA
#> 2        RGB      RGBA
#> 3       BGRA       BGR
#> 4       RGBA       RGB
#> 5        BGR      RGBA
#> 6        RGB      BGRA
